name: I'm Smarter!
blurb: "I'm Smarter!" is a trivia game with friends for iOS and Android where you can show people who's really the smartest one around!

rewards.reward: PRETTY SMART!:\r\n\r\nMy sincere thanks for believing in this project, and helping to make it a reality. In addition, you will receive a free copy of the game upon release!
Truly Intelligent:\r\n\r\nSame as the previous rewards PLUS two additional copies of the game for your friends to play!

WISE BEYOND MY YEARS:

Same as previous rewards PLUS a custom designed "I'm Smarter!" shot glass that says:

"I'm Smarter! 
...When I drink!"

(Domestic shipping only) PLUS!!! There will be a special NINTH category filled with random trivia questions/riddles/logic puzzles/whatever you can come up with solely created with the help of people who back this project at this level and higher. That means YOU! As long as you click this button :). Every good trivia question that you contribuite will display your full name or nickname (whichever you prefer) in the game along with your hometown! (unless you don't want to)

GENIUS:

Same as the $5 and $10 tiers PLUS a custom designed "I'm Smarter!" T-Shirt PLUS EARLY ACCESS to the game to help BETA test!

(Domestic shipping only)

ORACLE:

Same as previous rewards INCLUDING T-Shirt and shot glass. 

(Domestic shipping only)

HARVARD WAS MY BACKUP SCHOOL:

Same as previous rewards PLUS a custom designed "I'm Smarter!" frosted mug PLUS an addition two copies of the game to share with friends PLUS invite two friends to BETA test alongside you!

(Domestic shipping only)

SAT? THEY HAVEN'T CREATED A TEST FOR ME YET:\r\n\r\nSame as previous rewards PLUS a custom designed "I'm Smarter!" hoodie AND an unlimited amount of any "In-App Purchases" released in the future AND any future game developed by us.

"CAN'T FIGURE IT OUT"? WHAT DOES THAT STATEMENT EVEN MEAN??:\r\n\r\nSame as the previous awards PLUS international shipping of everything PLUS because of your considerable backing amount, you will be officially listed and recognized as a Producer of "I'm Smarter!" with all the rights, privileges, and honors pertaining.

MY NOBEL PRIZE IS GETTING LONELY...I'M GOING TO HAVE TO GET ANOTHER TO KEEP IT COMPANY:\r\n\r\nSame as all previous awards PLUS you will be officially listed and recognized as one of potentially five Executive Producers, where you will be exclusively consulted with for each and every current and future idea as well as having creative input.

ARISTOTLE.....NEWTON.....EINSTEIN....ME!:\r\n\r\nSame as previous awards PLUS round-trip domestic airfare to Boston, MA to meet, have dinner/drink, discuss the project/future potential/etc, and potentially help to plan and host a launch party/trivia tournament either at Babson College or in the Boston area PLUS you will be officially listed and recognized as a Co-Creator of "I'm Smarter!" alongside me with all the rights, privileges, and honors pertaining.
